LOAD.SELECT: APPLICATIONNUMBER='[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONNUMBER]' AND APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER=[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER] ORDER BY STAGENUMBER DESC, RISKASSESSMENTSEQUENCENUMBER DESC

EMPSTAT.SELECT: CUSTOMERNUMBER='[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERNUMBER]' AND CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER=[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER] AND DATELEFTORCEASEDTRADING IS NULL AND ((EMPLOYMENTSTATUS = 10 AND SHARESOWNEDINDICATOR=0) OR EMPLOYMENTSTATUS != 10)
CUSTOMERNUMBER='[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERNUMBER]' AND CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER=[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER] AND DATELEFTORCEASEDTRADING IS NULL AND EMPLOYMENTSTATUS = 10 AND SHARESOWNEDINDICATOR!=0

Memopad.MP_Text:
Download Type: AiP Date:Application Number: Application Notes: Additional Borrowing Amount: Other Loan Purpose: Interest Only Amount:
Customer:
Preferred Name:
Nature of Business:

Othrloan.SELECT: MORTGAGEACCOUNT.CUSTOMERNUMBER='[CustomerRole.CUSTOMERNUMBER]' AND MORTGAGEACCOUNT.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER=[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER] AND ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID=MORTGAGEACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID AND MORTGAGELOAN.ACCOUNTGUID = MORTGAGEACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID AND (ADDITIONALINDICATOR is null or ADDITIONALINDICATOR != 1)

MORTGAGEACCOUNT.CUSTOMERNUMBER='[CustomerRole.CUSTOMERNUMBER]' AND MORTGAGEACCOUNT.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER=[CUSTOMERROLE.CUSTOMERVERSIONNUMBER] AND ACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID=MORTGAGEACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID AND MORTGAGELOAN.ACCOUNTGUID = MORTGAGEACCOUNT.ACCOUNTGUID AND MORTGAGEACCOUNT.ADDITIONALINDICATOR=1

LOAD.SELECT: APPLICATIONNUMBER='[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONNUMBER]' AND APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER=[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER] AND SEQUENCENUMBER=(SELECT MAX(SEQUENCENUMBER) FROM APPLICATIONCREDITCHECK WHERE APPLICATIONNUMBER='[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONNUMBER]' AND APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER=[APPLICATIONFACTFIND.APPLICATIONFACTFINDNUMBER])
